title: Using a novel ‘difference-in-differences’ method and syndromic surveillance to estimate the change in local healthcare utilisation during periods of media reporting in the early stages of the COVID-19 pandemic in England
content:
Publication date: July 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 232

Author(s): A. Nikhab, R. Morbey, D. Todkill, A.J. Elliot
